Book.Title: Leviathan Wakes
Book.Author: James A Cordory
Book.Summary: Space is deadly, will they survive in the outer where no one can hear you scream?

Book.Title: Leviathan
Book.Author: Scoot Westerfeild
Book.Summary: World War 1 reimagioned with machines and Geneticly modified Animals who hate each others guts. While Alek Ferdinand the heir to the Clanker Throne is on the run. I wonder who he will meet on his journey.

Book.Title: Behemoth
Book.Author: Scoot Westerfeild
Book.Summary: The Behemoth is the fiercest creater in the British navy. It can swallow enemy battleships with one bite. The Darwinists will need it, now that they are att war with the Clanker Powers.

Movie.Title: Avengers: EndGame
Movie.Summary: Avengers are broken, the world is half gone, what is next?
